title: Bring the Remake Vote up automatically
body:
Is there any good reason in the world the client can't just bring up the remake window automatically when conditions are met?  Any?

We had TWO DC's at the beginning of a game tonight.  One lost 2 waves and a level, the other was even later to reconnect.  We missed the 30-second remake window because we were focused on trying to catch up.  This is not the first time.

I guess I can just sit at fountain next time and stare at chat until it comes up... heaven help me if someone says no to it.  But it seems a lot more player-friendly for the client to automatically bring up the vote box when the conditions for a remake are met.
